b
.
Social Security Benefits
Regular Social Security payments that are countable income for VA purposes are paid to workers and their dependents when the worker retires, becomes severely disabled, or dies.Â  These benefits are paid under Title II of the Social Security Act.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B - Social Security Administration (SSA) Benefits Program
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section B
